original_title: Beatriz González ¿Por qué llora si ya reí? Monólogo a tres voces
overview: What happened to painter Beatriz González, who made us laugh with the irony of her works, to get to the point of making a self-portrait that shows her crying naked? The path of the artist is intimately linked with the history of Colombia during the past fifty years.﻿
title: Beatriz González, why are you crying?
